name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David CHACKO, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David CHACKO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John P. Liekar, Public Defender, for appellant.
Jess D. Costa, Dist. Atty., Paul M. Petro, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
412 A.2d 1105
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David CHACKO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
John P. Liekar, Public Defender, for appellant.
Jess D. Costa, Dist. Atty., Paul M. Petro, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
